topicSummary: Bedwetting is involuntary wetting during sleep, without any inherent suggestion of frequency or pathophysiology.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: To reflect name change of ERIC, The Children's Bowel & Bladder Charity.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in September 2014 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key RCTs published since the last revision of this topic. No major changes to the recommendations have been made. A prescribing information section on desmopressin has been added to this topic.
